---
title: get_opposite
description: Returns the opposite direction.
---

## Signature

```py
def get_opposite() -> Direction
```

## Description

Returns the direction opposite to the current one, representing a 180Â° rotation.  
If called on `CENTER`, it returns `CENTER` since it has no opposite direction.

## Example

```py
dir = Direction.NORTH_EAST
opposite = dir.get_opposite()
print(opposite)  # Output: Direction.SOUTH_WEST
```
